item.title: Legendary Weighs Lionsgate Deal
item.description: The Apollo-backed ‘Dune’ and ‘Godzilla’ studio is considering a deal with the ‘John Wick’ and ‘Hunger Games’ studio.

item.title: Legendary Is Mulling Acquisition of Lionsgate Studios
item.description: Legendary Entertainment is eyeing a deal to acquire Lionsgate Studios, following the latter company’s recent separation from Starz, Variety has confirmed. The status of the two companies’
